SELECT schedule_no, schedule_type, schedule_title, schedule_course, departure_datetime, volunteer, schedule_content FROM schedule WHERE status=1 AND TO_CHAR(departure_datetime, 'yyyy-MM-dd') LIKE #{month} || '%'
SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn, temp.* FROM (SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE status=1 ORDER BY schedule_no desc) temp) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
